pullrequest.title: Include ignition-math dependencies inside the installed config.cmake file.

content.raw: I was having problems compiling [this](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/130) ign-transport pull request without this patch. In general, I think is nice that `find_package` adds all the internal dependencies to the cmake variables that the package exports. We hide all these details to the users.
content.html: I was having problems compiling this ign-transport pull request without this patch. In general, I think is nice that find_package adds all the internal dependencies to the cmake variables that the package exports. We hide all these details to the users.
